data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Heihe you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Heihe, Heilongjiang, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Heihe, Heilongjiang, China, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Heihe.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 107,154 believers in Heihe.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Saman people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, help 282 new simple churches start among the 1,412,500 people in the county of Heihe, Heilongjiang, China. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Heihe. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the county of Heihe, Heilongjiang, China has a population of 1,412,500.

We estimate Heihe has 107,154 people who might know Jesus, 22,819 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,282,527 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Heihe to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

location.name: Heihe
location.people_groups_list: Bogol, Tatar, Khakass, Oroqen, Olot, Kyakala
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bogol (1,400), Tatar, Khakass (800), Oroqen (11,000), Olot (3,200), Kyakala (3,000)
